long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NaijaCampusJams is an online media delivering quality and verifiable Nigerian content to home and abroad.

With the fields of entertainment, health, relationship, game updates, television updates, leaked videos, metro news, education

For quick news updates and quick shopping, NaijaCampusJams made this app.

How to use the app:
Step 1: Install the app as usual.
Step 2: Click on the application icon.
Step 3: Select the type and enter the quantity
Step 4: See the result

Contact and provide quick feedback on the application at:
- Djambalee@gmail.com
- Website: naijacampusjams.com
